Posts.Content: I'm 16 years old going on 17 and have a family history of breast cancer. My mom had Breast cancer that spread down to ovarian cancer and to the blood at 27,her mother and grandmother as well. 5 weeks ago I had leaking from both breasts nipples as well as itching,scaling and burning with discoloration. I went to doctors 4 weeks ago and they said I had staph infection. I took antibiotics and then went back because it continued they took a sonogram and said that my lymph nodes were very swollen and my breast had inflammation. I also been having pain in breast. Two days ago I checked my breast because its been a week and a half since my period and I found a hard painless lump on my left breast.
Posts.Title: PlS I need some support and resassurance before my biopsy today

Posts.Content: I'm 16 years old going on 17 and have a family history of breast cancer. Two days ago I checked my breast because its been a week and a half since my period and I found a hard painless lump on my left breast.
Posts.Title: Breast lumps
Possibility of Breast Cancer?! Misdiagnosed? Staph ?

Posts.Content: Thank you for replying. I will be going to doctors tomorrow morning,I will update what goes on.
